__e: You go over there today, Bert, and that's the last you'll see of this place, so help me God.
It was $225, but since you have two kids and Bert's so little, you owe two-hundo and I owe $25.
You said the last time that you communicated with Burt was three days ago-- that "Dear John" text.
You haven't told Bert, have you?
You know, if you'd rather skip lunch and hang out with your boyfriend Bert, it's totally okay.
I know Burt's death wasn't an accident.
